mechanics.trigger: Upon successful casting and for the duration of the spell
mechanics.condition: Target is a willing creature AND target is not wearing armor
mechanics.outcome: Target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier

description_text: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends. The target's base AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier. The spell ends if the target dons armor or if you dismiss the spell as an action.
